column4: just curious. did anyone here attend LinuxFest 2005 in Columbus Ohio?
anyone ever figure out how to mount ipod in ubuntu? I'm running 5.10 and when I plug ipod in, i get  ieee1394: Error parsing configrom for node 0-00:1023
man, the internet radio stations in amarok are pretty cool
I live in Columbus Ohio, but I didn't know there was a linuxfest
